task.instruction: You are Dorothy Kobayashi (dorothy.kobayashi@company.com). You would like to create a go-to template in 'Help' category with name as 'Support Basics' for Customer Support space by taking the details from page 23 and description as 'Customer support basics for new hires'. You would like to use this template further to create a new page but the content should be taken from the page which belongs to space 29 and its title is 'Getting Started Guide - Part 5'. You would like to add 'important' label to this new page and delete the original page 23.

output.title: System Requirements
output.content:
# System Requirements

System requirements and technical specifications.

## Hardware Requirements

This section covers hardware requirements related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper hardware requirements implementation.

## Software Dependencies

This section covers software dependencies related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper software dependencies implementation.

## Network Configuration

This section covers network configuration related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper network configuration implementation.

## Performance Specs

This section covers performance specs related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper performance specs implementation.

## Compatibility

This section covers compatibility related information and guidelines. Follow the procedures outlined here to ensure proper compatibility implementation.

## Additional Resources

- Related documentation links
- Support contact information
- Training materials

output.name: Customer Support
output.description: Knowledge base for customer support team including FAQs, troubleshooting guides, escalation procedures, and customer communication templates.
